about_the_game:
The Kingdom of Delta was attacked by the Empire of Chaos on the worst possible day - the National Day of πfest, when everyone rests. The Emperor took advantage of the surprise and the siege of the capital began in the evening. On top of that, a princess has been kidnapped! How will you react in the face of this misfortune?

FROM LOSER TO HERO

When the capital is besieged by Imperial soldiers, the ambitious young man Dirac Epsilon sets off on a journey. His goal is clear : to become a real man you can rely on. Despite his shortcomings, he decides to try because what else does he have left? His homeland - country flowing with honey and milk, where every crime is punished justly, where Yes be ‘Yes, and No, No, is sinking deeper and deeper into war. Ruined by chaos and omnipresent anarchy that cannot be comprehended by reason. Your task? Accompany him on this journey and see what adventures await for you.

CHOICES MATTER

On your adventure you will meet many people and other creatures - depending on your decisions they will become allies or enemies. If you forgive the goose that almost pecked you to death, it may become your best travel companion. You might as well grab it and bake it... The choices are yours, the future depends on your decisions.

What are you waiting for? Add to wishlist!

name: Kingdom of Delta

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E8400 or A4-4000
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GT or Radeon HD 7480D
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5-9400 or Ryzen 5 PRO 3350G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or Radeon RX Vega 11
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Kingdom of Delta is an adventurous 2D platform game whose story takes place in a monarchy ruled by those who love equations, order and rules. Your homeland has been attacked by the Empire of Chaos. Fight, grow and become stronger to prove to yourself that you are not a failure.
